title: English Conversation Practice: Talking About Family

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: Hi Sarah! How are you?

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: I’m good. How about you?

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: I’m great! Can I ask you about your family?

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: Definitely!

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: How many people are there in your family?

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: There are five people in my family.

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: Does your family live in a house or an apartment?

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: We live in a house in a rural area.

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: What do your parents do?

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: My father is a doctor, and my mother is a teacher. What about your parents?

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: My father works in an IT company, and my mother is a homemaker.

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: That’s nice! Do you have any siblings?

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: Yes, I have one older brother. He works as a software engineer. How about you?

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: I have a younger brother and an older sister.

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: That’s cool! What do you like to do with your family?

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: We like to watch movies together. What about you?

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: We play games and sometimes go for walks.

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: That sounds fun! It’s great to spend time with family.

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: Absolutely! Family time is always the best.

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: Thanks for sharing about your family.

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: No problem. It was nice talking to you about it!

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: Have a great day!

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: You too. Take care!

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: Hi! I’m Mark. What's your name?

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: I’m Peter. Nice to meet you!

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: Nice to meet you too!

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: Where are you from?

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: I’m from the United Kingdom. Are you from Canada?

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: No, I’m from Italy.

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: Oh, you're Italian! That's amazing.

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: Yes, I am. Italy is a beautiful country!

contents.name: Mark
contents.text: Absolutely! I’d love to visit someday.

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: You should! There's so much to see.

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: Have a good day.

contents.name: Peter
contents.text: Have a nice day.
